00025 #include "OgreSkeletonManager.h"
00026 
00027 #include "OgreSkeleton.h"
00028 
00029 namespace Ogre
00030 {
00031     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00032     template<> SkeletonManager* Singleton<SkeletonManager>::ms_Singleton = 0;
00033     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00034     SkeletonManager::SkeletonManager()
00035     {
00036 
00037 
00038     }
00039     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00040     Resource* SkeletonManager::create( const String& name)
00041     {
00042         return new Skeleton(name);
00043     }
00044     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00045     Skeleton* SkeletonManager::load( const String& filename, int priority)
00046     {
00047         Skeleton* pSkeleton = (Skeleton*)(getByName(filename));
00048         if (!pSkeleton)
00049         {
00050             pSkeleton = (Skeleton*)create(filename);
00051             ResourceManager::load(pSkeleton, priority);
00052         }
00053         return pSkeleton;
00054 
00055     }
00056     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00057     SkeletonManager& SkeletonManager::getSingleton(void)
00058     {
00059         return Singleton<SkeletonManager>::getSingleton();
00060     }
00061 
00062 
00063 
00064 }
